title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 260 - Access to records of the board for NON-FLFLPA Matters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 260 - Access to records of the board for NON-FLFLPA Matters

State Regulations
§ 260.1 - Records available for public inspection and copying
§ 260.2 - Designation of records access officer and appeals officer
§ 260.3 - Procedures for inspection and copying of records
§ 260.4 - Denials and appeals

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 260

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

Statutory authority: Labor Law, art. 20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
